ComicInfo.Summary:
The second powerful arc of Kieron Gillen's slick sci-fi epic kicks into high gear as Luiza discovers that some childhood horror stories are all too real. Something far worse than criminals has come to Mercury and the destruction it delivers eclipses anything she's ever dealt with. This plague is utterly devastating to the unfortunates who call the mining planet their home and now a woman with a penchant for busting skulls has to find a way to deal with something far more sinister and deadly than she's ever encountered.
Available with Regular, Wraparound, Art Nouveau, Excessive Force, and a special Interstellar Incentive Cover by series artist Nahuel Lopez.
